parameters.name: All
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to remove all tags from the resource. This parameter takes effect only if you do not specify TagKey.N. Valid values:

*   true
*   false

Default value: false.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the resource. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~25609~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: ResourceId
parameters.description: The resource IDs. Valid values of N: 1 to 50.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description:
The type of the resource. Valid values:

*   instance: ECS instance
*   disk: disk
*   snapshot: snapshot
*   image: image
*   securitygroup: security group
*   volume: storage volume
*   eni: elastic network interface (ENI)
*   ddh: dedicated host
*   ddhcluster: dedicated host cluster
*   keypair: SSH key pair
*   launchtemplate: launch template
*   reservedinstance: reserved instance
*   snapshotpolicy: automatic snapshot policy
*   elasticityassurance: elasticity assurance
*   capacityreservation: capacity reservation
*   command: Cloud Assistant command
*   invocation: Cloud Assistant command execution result

parameters.name: TagKey
parameters.description: The tag keys. Valid values of N: 1 to 20.
